about.title: About me
about.paragraph1: Frontend development is not just a job for me, it's a passion. This passion inspires me to learn new things and become better every day. I'm at the forefront of technology, creating experiences that users expect and love.
about.paragraph2: Being a frontend developer requires more than just writing code. It's about creating a visually appealing and functional experience for every user. This work is a craft where my creativity and technical knowledge work in harmony.

achievements.engineering_years: +4 Years of experience in environmental engineering
achievements.mapping_months: 7 Month of experience in mapping operator

contact_description: I am ready to create a beautiful and functional web experience for you...

hero.intro: I'm Rasul Garavaliyev, junior frontend developer based in Azerbaijan
hero.description: I specialize in building dynamic and user-friendly interfaces using modern web technologies. I am proficient in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, with strong expertise in frameworks like React.

footer_contact_message: You can click on the number and contact via WhatsApp or contact by clicking on the icon
